meanings.definition: The act of placing a dead body in a tomb.
meanings.sent1: The entombment of the pharaoh was a solemn ceremony.
meanings.sent2: After the entombment, the tomb was sealed shut.
meanings.sent3: The entombment of the treasure chest in the backyard was a playful game for the children.
meanings.sent4: The entombment of memories in our hearts keeps them safe forever.
meanings.sent5: The entombment of the time capsule marked a moment frozen in history.

meanings.definition: The state of being buried in a tomb.
meanings.sent1: The entombment of the ancient king was discovered by archaeologists.
meanings.sent2: The entombment of the mummy was a mysterious event.
meanings.sent3: The entombment of the lost key in the garden led to a treasure hunt.
meanings.sent4: The entombment of secrets in the old diary revealed a hidden past.
meanings.sent5: The entombment of the fallen soldier honored his sacrifice.
